attributes.action: Ask Sir Christopher Kelly to investigate Dr Kalvis Jansons Petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To ask the chairman of the Committee on Standards in Public Life to audit and investigate the 10 Dowing Street website....

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/please-go/

Asking Prime Minister Gordon Brown to resign. Where, in spite of increasing media coverage, the number of signatories has virually stalled. This is all the more bizarre as within the first five days of the petition being launched by Dr Jansons, the e-Petition shot to the number one spot with over 48,000 people signing.

It is becoming apparent that many people are registering on this petition, but not being counted. This may bringing the Downing Street Petition reputation and standards into possible disrepute.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
